name: Two Hands Eggs
description:
Two hands! Lots of fun!
Two Hands Egg is just a normal egg...except for the fact that it has two hands!
You can also turn into an egg and run, jump, and swim!



All you need to do is use the two sticks on the controller.
When you tilt the stick, the hand moves in conjunction with the stick.
If you hit the ground with your hand, you will jump.
You can do various movements such as walking by rotating your hand like a tire.

Stage mode

6 stages each in 4 worlds (grass, ice, water, volcano)

Party mode

2-4 player mode
There are two types at the start of early access.

Sumo
Mode where you defeat your opponent!
The last egg remaining is the winner! !

Volleyball
Volleyball using an egg-shaped ball!
There are many types of balls and courts.
